gethierarchy.description: Get objects with hierarchy as an array.

attributes.include_draft: If object has column 'status', Whether to include not published objects.
attributes.cols: Column name for SELECT(Comma separated values).

getmenustructure.description: Get menu items with hierarchy as an array. When id, name, basename are not specified, get all menu items.

attributes.name: Column 'name' of the Menu.
attributes.global: When a value is specified, SELECT the system scope Menu.
attributes.include_draft: If object has column 'status', Whether to include not published objects.
